headline.main: 75 ARMY CASUALTIES ON PHILIPPINE LIST; Soldiers Killed in Action or Dead of Wounds Raised to Total of 513

lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, June 3 (U.P.) -- The War Department today announced the names of seventy-five additional soldiers who were killed in action or died of wounds in the Philippines. It was the final list of American soldiers reported killed in the islands and brings the total to 513.
snippet: WASHINGTON, June 3 (U.P.) -- The War Department today announced the names of seventy-five additional soldiers who were killed in action or died of wounds in the Philippines. It was the final list of American soldiers reported killed in the islands...
